Name: Detoxifier Module
Description: Detoxifier Module General Category Modules Description Releases a steady micro dose of antivenom, enhancing poison resistance. Flavor Text The Detoxifier is classified under UDA regulations as technically qualifying users as a cyborg. Attributes +50 Poison Resistance Crafting Research Cost 75 25 Crafting Cost 50 10 Prerequisite Mass Dampener Module
